casebody.data:
SED HOLDINGS, LLC
v.
3 STAR PROPERTIES, LLC, et al. 211PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2016 R. Hayes Hofler, III, Attorney at Law, Keith B. Nichols, Attorney at Law, for 3 Star Properties, LLC, et al. Douglas W. Hanna, Attorney at Law, Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, for SED Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of October 2016 by Defendant-Appellant to Appear:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2016."
